comments:
If you have an out if sync resource visible in the packages view an Internal 
Error occurs when you exit Eclipse.

STEPS
1) Load a project under CVS control
2) Change the Entries file in the CVS folder outside of Eclipse
3) Exit the workbench - you get the folowing error

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
